description: Triggered when a new sound is posted in a playlist.

placeholders.name: SpotifyTrackName
placeholders.description: The name of the spotify track.

placeholders.name: SpotifyTrackExplicit
placeholders.description: 'explicit' if the track is explicit empty elsewhere.

placeholders.name: SpotifyTrackDuration
placeholders.description: Duration of the track in milliseconds.

placeholders.name: SpotifyTrackArtistName
placeholders.description: The name of the main artist of this track.

placeholders.name: SpotifyTrackArtistId
placeholders.description: The spotify id of the main artist of this track.

placeholders.name: SpotifyTrackArtistUrl
placeholders.description: The spotify url of the main artist of this track.

placeholders.name: SpotifyTrackAddedAt
placeholders.description: The timestamp when the track was added ISO formated.

placeholders.name: SpotifyTrackAddedById
placeholders.description: The value of the user who have added this track to playlist.

placeholders.name: SpotifyTrackId
placeholders.description: The spotify id of the added track.

placeholders.name: SpotifyTrackUri
placeholders.description: The spotify uri of the added track.
